response.original_title: トモヲ⇔ヨーコ 愛の往復書簡
response.overview: Yoko, my love. I want to tell you that I love you with all my words. I'm waiting for your reply. The single-minded Tomowo's courtship video letters gradually escalate into self-deprecation. He offers a flower and slides down a cliff, he offers a chick and falls into a pond, he is covered in scars and risks his life to confess his love. But Yoko easily tramples on the man's pure heart... The perverse world of love between Tomowo and Yoko awakens a forgotten passion in today's lovers.
response.title: TOMOO⇔YOKO;LOVE LETTER
